name: Shroud of Turin
shortDescription: The Holy Burial Cloth Bearing Christ's Miraculous Image
fullDescription:
The Holy Burial Cloth Bearing Christ's Miraculous Image The Shroud of Turin is a length of linen cloth bearing the faint image of a crucified man, believed
                    by millions to be Jesus Christ himself. The image displays anatomically correct details of a man
                    who suffered wounds consistent with the Gospel accounts of Christ's crucifixion, including marks
                    from scourging, a crown of thorns, and wounds in the wrists and feet.
